title: Shocon: Simple Pure-Scala Typesafe HOCON Implementation Using FastParse
author: based2
content: readme.md shoconshocon is simple, pure-scala, alternative implementation the hoconspecification.shocon ships a native, scala-idiomatic api, a shim mimics typesafe config java api, making well-suited a drop- replacement wherever java implementation is available, such scala.js projects. implementation does cover of corner cases the original implementation. issues prs are welcome!usageadd lines your build.sbtscala project:librarydependencies += "eu.unicredit" %% "shocon" % "0.1.8"scala.js project:librarydependencies += "eu.unicredit" %%% "shocon" % "0.1.8"notessince implementation is unaware be a jvm classloader, such reference is ignored will null.default configuration is loaded "application.conf" resources statically compile (using macros) integrated a string target code.
